name: Hippi Hangry
description:
Hippi loves eating watermelon, but gorilla and red fire balls make it tough as they chase her. Can you help hippi to eat her favorite fruit??

Hippi is starving for days now.

This time he has got a chance to avoid obstacles, gorrilla and red fire balls and eat unlimited watermelons.

Can you help him eat the most and make him free from hunger??
